extendedInfo.description: The ComfortDelGro Driver Job Bidding App allows ComfortDelGro cabbies to bid for advance booking jobs of their choice while on-the-go. All they need to do is download the app and log in at their convenience.Main Functions View Job Postings-	Displays a list of advance booking jobs available for bidding that allows cabby to choose based on their preferred date, time and pick-up pointConfirmed Jobs-	Displays details of all confirmed advance booking jobs acquired via the MDT (Mobile Data Terminal) or the app -	Digital maps available for planning of routes to pick-up pointsMessages-	For cabbies to receive broadcast messages or send canned messages when neededDRO Feedback-	For cabbies to email feedback or enquiries to Driver Relations Officers (DROs)  Report - Send iPhone Logs-	For cabbies to send feedback regarding problems with the app System RequirementsComfortDelGro Driver Job Bidding application can run on OS v1.6 and above. Features of this application may vary according to different versions of operating system and phone models.

reviews.title: Zero star if we can rate it.
reviews.comment: You are penalising android user. No point using it as we are slower than MDT and iphone user.  Don\'t waste your time. Let us just concentrate on the road till they change back to the original one.
reviews.author: daniel koh

reviews.title: 4 star for me even though can\' manage to get s single midnite job
reviews.comment: Wud be easier if d green BID Button enlarge horizontally for easier and faster job bid, for drivers having large fingers, hope u will take my comment as positif
reviews.author: BOND SAWI

reviews.title: LOUSY!
reviews.comment: REVERT BACK TO OLD VERSION WITHOUT 30 SECS. STOP WASTING OUR DRIVER TIME! WHAT A SHAME TO DISCOURAGE DRIVER TO BID FOR ADVANCE JOB!
reviews.author: Andrew Goh

reviews.title: Bad to WORSE
reviews.comment: Hi all CDG drivers, this app is getting from bad to worse!! Wasting time holding on to the phone bid n bid and keep hanging!!
reviews.author: Kelvin Ezekiel

reviews.title: GIVE BACK OLD VERSION!!
reviews.comment: Rubbish update... i going to write in & complaint.  !!!
reviews.author: Vincent Chua

reviews.title: Why re-invent the wheels ?
reviews.comment: Guys i am both an android and an ios user .This update not only affects android but also ios users.The 5 seconds refreshed is such a waste of time and money for the drivers.Hey we are paying for the data connections and these guys dont take that into considerations because all they know is that their rentals are met daily by the drivers.Updates are supposed to be helpful not making it worse than it was before.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: 30s refresh had changed to 5s. But the thing is Why not just remove the waiting time???  It\'s definitely not helpful at all! The waiting time is simply wasting our time! Really stupid update.
reviews.author: Vincent Lee

reviews.title: Very bad prog
reviews.comment: Juz feel that the older version we can refresh anytime we want. But some time when we try to refresh it will show some of the repeated job which was already been taken and no longer available. Juz feel that this version with 30s refresh thing was a waste of time for all driver. Normally people remake the program to a newer version is to make it better. However now it was making it worse. Should have make it like a real time update of every job been taken by call centre and push it to us.
reviews.author: Andy Seah

reviews.title: Check out the lastest no.1 rubbish apps...
reviews.comment: Bid for job, can\'t get... press refresh, still must wait... go check on comfirm job, system under maintenance... What is all these rubbish????? Comfortdelgro... u r so call big brother of taxi company... n u are giving these to your hard working drivers? Please do something fast... drivers are not happy with this current bid system that u so call \"BETTER VERSION\" rubbish. Thank you.
reviews.author: CHER C.F.

reviews.title: stupid
reviews.comment: What\'s the point of changing the soup without changing the base??? 5 secs???
